summary: This test module validates the behavior of AWS Glue DataBrew job management operations using mocked AWS services. It includes tests for creating profile and recipe jobs, handling duplicate names, invalid parameters, deleting jobs, describing jobs, and listing jobs with various filters and pagination.
business_intent: Ensure that DataBrew job lifecycle functions (create, delete, describe, list, update) work correctly and handle error conditions as expected, providing reliable automation for data preparation workflows.
